metadata.name: Cosmic Dance
metadata.description:
We are all but dancers to the tune of Shiva - symbol of cosmic stillness and cosmic dance at the same time.

Life is a cosmic dance, 
A rhythm that weaves and sways, 
A melody that enchants and entrances, 
A symphony that plays.

The stars above, they twirl and spin, 
In an endless celestial waltz, 
The planets follow, in tune and in time, 
With a grace that never halts.

The sun, it boogies and jives, 
In a fiery, dazzling display, 
Its energy pulsing and surging, 
A beat that we can feel and obey.

And down here on earth, we move and groove, 
In a dance that's uniquely our own, 
We sway and dip, we strut and twirl, 
And let our spirits be fully shown.

Life is a cosmic dance, 
And we are all part of the show, 
May we embrace the rhythm and flow, 
And may our souls be free to glow.
